attributes.action: Repeal Those Parts Of The Smoking Ban that Were Not Originally Included In The Governments Manifesto
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That this government repeals those parts of the smoking ban that were not included in their manifesto. Their manifesto is a sales letter spelling out what the government proposes to do if it re-elected. They lied. After getting re-elected they reneged on their commitment as set out in their manifesto and should now make the necessary changes. They got votes under false pretences.
